scripts.deploy-testnet: graph deploy marlin-staging/staking-arb1-goerli subgraph-app3.yaml --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token

scripts.deploy-staging: graph deploy --product hosted-service marlin-staging/staking-arb1 --ipfs https://api.thegraph.com/ipfs/ --node https://api.thegraph.com/deploy/ --access-token
